sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: The &app; application manages the desktop background. It sets a background image and/or color and it pops up a menu when you click on it with your mouse. Along with the apllication two settings dialogs are installed that can be used with the XFce settings manager. These dialogs allow you to change the background image and color and set number of workspaces and their names.
